items.title: Illinois Tool Gears Up to Report Q1 Earnings: What to Expect
items.description: ITW's first-quarter results are likely to gain from strength across the Test & Measurement and Electronics and Specialty Products units. Softness in the Automotive OEM segment is expected to weigh on results.
